definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.chinese: 甲狀腺功能減退是可以通過藥物治療好的。

sentences.english: Choroidal folds in the macular area suggest hypotony .
sentences.chinese: 黃斑區脈絡膜皺褶提示張力減退。

sentences.english: Clinical analysis of 70 cases with chronic adrenocortical hypofunction.
sentences.chinese: 慢性腎上腺皮質功能減退症70例臨牀分析。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is suggested that urine acidifying function of renal tubules declined with aging.
sentences.chinese: 結論老年隨年齡增長，腎小管泌氫功能減退。

sentences.english: With the intensification of left ventricular hypertrophy, the LVDF decreased further.
sentences.chinese: 且隨着左室肥厚的加重，舒張功能進一步減退。

sentences.english: Cancer patients diminished sense of taste, loss of appetite, poor digestion.
sentences.chinese: 癌症病人的味覺減退，食慾下降，消化功能很差。

sentences.english: Conclusion OSAHS can result in memory hypofunction.
sentences.chinese: 結論OSAHS可引起記憶功能減退。

sentences.english: Even biscuit can blunt the edge of your appetite .
sentences.chinese: 一塊甜餅也會使你的食慾減退。

sentences.english: There was no hypoparathyroidism and recurrent nerve paralysis in this group.
sentences.chinese: 術後無永久性甲狀旁腺功能減退和喉返神經麻痹。

sentences.english: The simulated hypoxia phenomena develop during the neap tide and disappear during the spring tide .
sentences.chinese: 缺氧現象的發展與減退受潮汐漲落的影響。

sentences.english: Individuals who abused alcohol at an early age show decision-making impairments.
sentences.chinese: 在較早的年紀濫用酒精的老鼠顯示出決斷能力的減退。

sentences.english: Bureaucracy, after many years of decline, will be on the rise again.
sentences.chinese: 官僚主義在經過幾年的減退之後，會重新復燃。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical features of respiratory failure secondary to hypothyroidism .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析甲狀腺機能減退症致呼吸衰竭的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Perceived lack of concentration, memory loss.
sentences.chinese: 自覺注意力不集中，記憶減退。

sentences.english: The cause of these changes was subsequently found to be hypothyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 最終發現這些改變的原因是甲狀腺功能減退。

definition: to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
to improve/to take a turn for the better/improvement
to defer/to postpone/to put off/to retard/to slow sth down
